raw_body: FERNANDO – GODWIN. Husband of late Pearl Fernando,​ father of Prasantha Fernando and Sharmila Perera,​ brother of late Fr. Mervyn Fernando,​ father-in-law of Sneha Fernando and Rohan Perera,​ expired. Burial at Ss. Peter and Paul Catholic Church,​ Lunawa,​ Moratuwa. Details to follow.002715
